name: Endeavour: Survival
description:
HERE YOU CAN PURCHASE YOUR KEY TO ACTIVATE ENDEAVOUR. Your download contains a .txt file where are instruccions and you SERIAL KEY.# Be creative as you want and survive!
#multiplayer #survival

Download free-trial in:

http://gamejolt.com/games/endeavour-survival-multi...

Endeavour is a First Person Survival Game where you can find food, kills animals, build your own house, and a lot of amazing things.

Do you like Endeavour? Get the full game at:
https://myadtech.itch.io/endeavour-survival

FULL VERSION INCLUDES:
- 2 worlds
- Full inventory
- Complete build system
- Technical Support 24/7
- T-Shirt of Endeavour
- Background
* Multiplayer version (available on future updates)

What does your purchase include?

A serial key to activate Endeavour and Endeavour 0.1.3

# Follow us for updates of the game!

# IMPORTANT!
## Windows: If you have Endeavour version 0.0.5 or less, you need to uninstall (go to C:\Program Files\Endeavour and find Uninstall), download the latest version here and install it normally.
## Mac: Uninstall older versions and install 0.1.0
